content: millet is a crocheted cowl worked in an easy cluster stitch pattern this cowl is worked flat back and forth and then seamed best of all it only uses two skeins of berroco vintage® dk so it s a fast affordable and stylish project **finished measurements** approximately 29 around x 11½ high **yarn** berroco vintage dk 100 grs 2 hanks #2116 dove **needles and notions** crochet hook size 3 50 mm e or size to obtain gauge
